name: udemy-nasa-project
description: React based front-end and node.js server side

scripts.start: npm run server client & npm run client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client & npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client & npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server & npm test --prefix client

author: pineapple
